@usedefault

{{cbspace id:$$id}}


h2. CloudSpace: ${name}

{{toc: start=3}}

{{actions:  
- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/destroy
  data:
   cloudspaceId: $$id
   cloudspaceName: ${name}
   accountname: ${accountname}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Create Machine
  action: '#createmachine'

- display: Move FW Node
  action: '#movefwnode'

- display: Restore FW Node
  action: '#restorefwnode'

- display: Add Extra IP
  action: /restmachine/cludbroker/cloudspace/addExtraIP
  input:
  - ipaddress
  - reason

- display: Remove IP
  action: /restmachine/cludbroker/cloudspace/removeIP
  input:
  - ipaddress
  - reason

- display: Remove VFW
  action: /restmachine/cludbroker/cloudspace/removeVFW
  input:
  - reason
  data:
   cloudspaceId: $$id

- display: Deploy VFW
  action: /restmachine/cludbroker/cloudspace/restoreVirtualFirewall
  input:
  - reason
  data:
   cloudspaceId: $$id

- display: Update Name
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/updateName
  input:
  - newname
  data:
   cloudspaceId: $$id

- display: Grant User Access
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/addUser
  data:
   cloudspaceId: $$id
  input:
   - username
   - accesstype

- display: Revoke User Access
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/deleteUser
  data:
   cloudspaceId: $$id
  input:
   - username

}}

{{createmachine: cloudspaceId:$$id}}

h3. Details
|*CloudSpace ID*|$$id|
|*Account*|[${accountname}|account?id=${accountid}]|
|*Network ID*|${networkid}|
|*Status*|${status}|
|*Location*|${location}|
|*Access Control List*|${acl}|
|*Description*|${descr}|
|*Public IP Adress*|${publicipaddress}|
|*Resource Limits*|${resourcelimits}|

h3. Port Fowardings
||Source IP||Source Port||Destination IP||Destination Port||
{% for rule in network.tcpForwardRules -%}
|${rule.fromAddr}|${rule.fromPort}|${rule.toAddr}|${rule.toPort}|
{% endfor %}

h3. Virtual Machines
{{vmachines cloudspaceid:$$id}}

h3. CPU Nodes
{{cbnodes space:$$id}}
